Articles.Content:
I'm sure it is (great looking bird BTW)! I've kind of set myself a limit of four jet engines and 300 parts, otherwise my PC starts getting a hernia.

Cupcake...

and here i was thinking to ask you if you wanted to test the arrowhead mk2 nevermind

and here i was thinking to ask you if you wanted to test the arrowhead mk2 nevermind

Sorry, even without my PCs limitations times just a bit short right now. You can put some pics of the Arrowhead here if you like, It'll be nice to have a look it.

Cupcake...

Hey Cupcake!

I've been wrapped up in other stuff recently, but I did manage to get another 3 crafts squeezed in to the Junkyard after much delay. You could head down and check it out if you had a few minutes. (link in my sig.)
Wow. I just decided to do a Jool grand tour, and my craft has twice the thrust of yours, but still an enourmous manuever node. How can you stand the half-hour long burn?

Wow. I just decided to do a Jool grand tour, and my craft has twice the thrust of yours, but still an enourmous manuever node. How can you stand the half-hour long burn?

I was hoping Mechjeb would do it for me but in the end I had to do it all myself. It was pretty painful.

Cupcake...

Edited August 4, 2014 by Cupcake...

Sorry everyone I haven't posted anything here...

Work is in progress at my KSC.

(Suddenly loud machinery noises and fog waft over your KSC'S).

Hey cupcake, remember how you said you'd like to have a dropship battle at some point?

I've got a new front-runner for one.

Sorry everyone I haven't posted anything here...

Work is in progress at my KSC.

(Suddenly loud machinery noises and fog waft over your KSC'S).

It's not a race' date=' take your time.

Hey cupcake, remember how you said you'd like to have a dropship battle at some point?

I've got a new front-runner for one.

http://i.imgur.com/VkvPgGv.png

http://i.imgur.com/zAkCF52.png

Very nice! I like the paint job too. What else have you got hidden away in that cargo hold there? Darthzeus and I have been talking about organising a dropship battle in DMP. Sadly it doesn't sound like it'll work in the athmosphere however a battle on the Mun or Minmus may be doable. With this in mind it may be worth adapting one or more of your vessels for low g Munar combat.

Cupcake...

Hey cupcake, remember how you said you'd like to have a dropship battle at some point?

I've got a new front-runner for one.

http://i.imgur.com/VkvPgGv.png

http://i.imgur.com/zAkCF52.png

Nice man! But way too grey, doesn't suit my sense of aesthetics.

It's not a race, take your time.

That's not what I mean, but yeah, I will take my time, of course.

It's not a race, take your time.

Very nice! I like the paint job too. What else have you got hidden away in that cargo hold there? Darthzeus and I have been talking about organising a dropship battle in DMP. Sadly it doesn't sound like it'll work in the athmosphere however a battle on the Mun or Minmus may be doable. With this in mind it may be worth adapting one or more of your vessels for low g Munar combat.

Cupcake...

I'll have to do some Mun/Minmus testing with it (I call it the Vulture), and the cargo hold has this inside:

This config allows light cargo hauling and 4-6 Kerbal infantrymen simultaneously.

Also, boom.

Yeah, I gotta start modifying stuff for minmus combat, seeing as Cupcake's already prepared for it

Also, Script, it that universe replacer you're using for the reflection in the kerbal's visor?

oh, and before I forget, I've released two new VTOLs, however these are my company page check that out here

Edited August 5, 2014 by Darthzeus
Man, can I have a download link, that looks awesome man! I must modify that! I must take it to my precision KSC facilities and make it better.

Also, Script, it that universe replacer you're using for the reflection in the kerbal's visor?

Yup (technically, it's Texture Replacer, but it's basically the same thing), and also EVE with the Dunan dust storms addon+KerbPaint.

I gotta update EVE and TR though, as I like my helmetless kerbals.

Also, Minmus shall soon become an epic zero-g firing range!

I'll have to do some Mun/Minmus testing with it (I call it the Vulture), and the cargo hold has this inside:

http://i.imgur.com/CttAH8g.png

This config allows light cargo hauling and 4-6 Kerbal infantrymen simultaneously.

Also, boom.

http://i.imgur.com/8iNhFt5.png

Nice shot!

Yeah, I gotta start modifying stuff for minmus combat, seeing as Cupcake's already prepared for it

Also, Script, it that universe replacer you're using for the reflection in the kerbal's visor?

oh, and before I forget, I've released two new VTOLs, however these are my company page check that out here

Hey man,

You might want to check over your imgur links, I couldn't get the spoiler/second craft to open.

Cupcake...

Nice shot!

Hey man,

You might want to check over your imgur links, I couldn't get the spoiler/second craft to open.

Cupcake...

Hmm... weird. Seems to work fine for me

Hmm... weird. Seems to work fine for me

I'm still having trouble viewing it, maybe its my browser. Sorry.

In other news the Tadpole has been rebalanced and is ready to serve in .24, yay!

I've taken the chance to give the old girl a few tweaks including the ability to fold in the front landing leg through action group 7.

Even with all three legs deployed the Tadpole was something of a mountain goat, but by folding in the front leg it can land in places even your Kerbal's will have trouble standing! Anyway, hope you enjoy the upgrade and let me know if you have any problems.

Cupcake...

Edited August 8, 2014 by Cupcake...

Yay! Looks like I picked the right week to get back into the forums!

On behalf of the Tadpole Appreciation Society and the Tadpole Enthusiasts (recently merged) I would like to thank you for continuing to support the Tadpole in 0.24!

The Tadpole may be no spring-chicken, but to T.A.S.T.E it is a delicious bread-and-butter lander that's always on the menu.

Why am I suddenly hungry?

Yay! Looks like I picked the right week to get back into the forums!

On behalf of the Tadpole Appreciation Society and the Tadpole Enthusiasts (recently merged) I would like to thank you for continuing to support the Tadpole in 0.24!

The Tadpole may be no spring-chicken, but to T.A.S.T.E it is a delicious bread-and-butter lander that's always on the menu.

Why am I suddenly hungry?

It's lovely to see your smiling green face again, welcome back!

CRAFT FILE:

http://goo.gl/QHKH9Y

I also wanted let you guys download the Wraith, the latest VTOL Gunship in the fleet and a craft that improves on the Banshee Mk3 in almost every way. I'm still pretty flat out at Uni so I haven't had time to shoot a nice video for it yet. Once I do it'll be officially released with its own thread but I thought you guys might enjoy having a play with it in the meantime. I've included 3 instant action missions which will let you sharpen your shooting skills. Enjoy!

Cupcake...

http://i.imgur.com/92d6hsk.jpg

I also wanted let you guys download the Wraith, the latest VTOL Gunship in the fleet and a craft that improves on the Banshee Mk3 in almost every way. Cupcake...

Excellent work, as always

I've been looking at minmus combat options, and have been running into similar issues you have in the "in space no one can hear you explode" video, where one must alternately accelerate towards target then take aim, fire. Been fiddling with the concept of mounting rockets in a way they'd fire "up", or in the opposite vector as your engine. Hm... work to be done

Excellent work, as always

I've been looking at minmus combat options, and have been running into similar issues you have in the "in space no one can hear you explode" video, where one must alternately accelerate towards target then take aim, fire. Been fiddling with the concept of mounting rockets in a way they'd fire "up", or in the opposite vector as your engine. Hm... work to be done

Combat on Minmus does take a fair bit of getting used to, you do kind of miss the strong reassuring grip of Kerbin's gravity! I'm thinking the Mun or maybe even Val could be a better option. Actually Val's got some fantastic terrain, especially around the poles.

Cupcake...

Hm... how bout a micro or nano fighter, most of it's space is taken up by weapons, perhaps?

I have an idea to make a Lite Fighter...

- - - Updated - - -

I'm still having trouble viewing it, maybe its my browser. Sorry.

In other news the Tadpole has been rebalanced and is ready to serve in .24, yay!

http://i.imgur.com/tHlOmCR.jpg

I've taken the chance to give the old girl a few tweaks including the ability to fold in the front landing leg through action group 7.

http://i.imgur.com/zCOmZWN.jpg

Even with all three legs deployed the Tadpole was something of a mountain goat, but by folding in the front leg it can land in places even your Kerbal's will have trouble standing! Anyway, hope you enjoy the upgrade and let me know if you have any problems.

Cupcake...

But can it handle THE (vertical) WALL?

Basically, a tiny fighter that can be easily transported.

Just gonna throw this out there... Jeb/bill bombing around Pol in a Cupcake inspired RCS tug/scooter:

And returning to the mostly stock but not really stock, also Cupcake inspired lander, in full refuel mode (normally only the middle section lands, the drive unit stores the Tylo-Crash-Prevention-Oomph-Pods ). Normally the huge xenon tanks on the side are on the drive unit too:

Honestly I want a cupcake certified sticker on the side of my landers or something.

Just gonna throw this out there... Jeb/bill bombing around Pol in a Cupcake inspired RCS tug/scooter:

http://i.imgur.com/NPVCeff.jpg

And returning to the mostly stock but not really stock, also Cupcake inspired lander, in full refuel mode (normally only the middle section lands, the drive unit stores the Tylo-Crash-Prevention-Oomph-Pods ). Normally the huge xenon tanks on the side are on the drive unit too:

http://i.imgur.com/uAF56Yi.jpg

Honestly I want a cupcake certified sticker on the side of my landers or something.

Your certification sticker with complimentary air freshener is in the post. Well done on getting to the Jool system, how you finding it there? Oh and what's that mod you're using for the far drop tanks? They look great.

Cupcake...
